metadata.title: CVE-2023-37203 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Insufficient validation in the Drag and Drop API in conjunction with social engineering, may have allowed an attacker to trick end-users into creating a shortcut to local system files. This could have been leveraged to execute arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 115.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap

criterions.comment: firefox package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
